io.scanbot.sdk.camera

Class FinderPictureCallback

  • io.scanbot.sdk.camera.FinderPictureCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasePictureCallback

    public class FinderPictureCallback
implements BasePictureCallback

    Represents implementation of interface BasePictureCallback that rotates and crops a part of the snapped image which is visible in the Finder view

    See Also:
    interface BasePictureCallback
